title: Trump says guns will be top of the agenda with governors
text:
Trump says guns will be top of the agenda with governors 2:42am GMT - 01:04 
As U.S. President Donald Trump hosted governors for dinner at the White House on Sunday, he said discussions on guns will be on their agenda as they meet this week. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
As U.S. President Donald Trump hosted governors for dinner at the White House on Sunday, he said discussions on guns will be on their agenda as they meet this week. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2CJi5tq
